languages.text: "Экклезиархии, наверное, очень выгодно представлять себя сборищем святых. Но я, прости, в это не верю".

traits.locale_text: "Экклезиархии, наверное, очень выгодно представлять себя сборищем святых. Но я, прости, в это не верю".

languages.text: "I imagine it is very advantageous for the Ecclesiarchy to pose as a congregation of saints. Forgive me for not buying any of it."
languages.original_text: "Экклезиархии, наверное, очень выгодно представлять себя сборищем святых. Но я, прости, в это не верю".

traits.locale_text: "I imagine it is very advantageous for the Ecclesiarchy to pose as a congregation of saints. Pardon me for not buying any of it."
"I imagine it is very advantageous for the Ecclesiarchy to pose as a congregation of saints. Pardon me for not buying any of it."
"I imagine it is very advantageous for the Ecclesiarchy to pose as a congregation of saints. Forgive me for not buying any of it."
"I imagine it is very advantageous for the Ecclesiarchy to pose as a congregation of saints. Forgive me for not buying any of it."
"I imagine it is very advantageous for the Ecclesiarchy to pose as a congregation of saints. Forgive me for not buying any of it."

languages.text: “我想，对国教的那群人来说，摆出一副圣人的样子绝对是件有利可图的事情。请原谅我不相信这些东西。”
languages.original_text: "I imagine it is very advantageous for the Ecclesiarchy to pose as a congregation of saints. Forgive me for not buying any of it."

traits.locale_text: “我想，对国教的那群人来说，摆出一副圣人的样子绝对是件有利可图的事情。请原谅我不相信这些东西。”

languages.text: «Imagino que, para la Eclesiarquía, hacerse pasar por una congregación de santos es muy positivo. Disculpe por no creer sus palabras».
languages.original_text: "I imagine it is very advantageous for the Ecclesiarchy to pose as a congregation of saints. Forgive me for not buying any of it."

traits.locale_text: «Imagino que, para la Eclesiarquía, hacerse pasar por una congregación de santos es muy positivo. Disculpe por no creer sus palabras».

languages.text: 「聖人の集まりを装うのは帝国聖教会にとって非常に有利となるのだろう。申し訳ないが、何ひとつ信じられない」
languages.original_text: "I imagine it is very advantageous for the Ecclesiarchy to pose as a congregation of saints. Forgive me for not buying any of it."

traits.locale_text: 「聖人の集まりを装うのは帝国聖教会にとって非常に有利となるのだろう。申し訳ないが、何ひとつ信じられない」

languages.text: "Ich würde meinen, dass es für die Ekklesiarchie von großem Vorteil ist, als Kongregation von Heiligen aufzutreten. Vergebt mir, wenn ich nichts davon glaube."
languages.original_text: "I imagine it is very advantageous for the Ecclesiarchy to pose as a congregation of saints. Forgive me for not buying any of it."

traits.locale_text: "Ich würde meinen, dass es für die Ekklesiarchie von großem Vorteil ist, als Kongregation von Heiligen aufzutreten. Vergebt mir, wenn ich nichts davon glaube."

languages.text: « J'imagine que l'Ecclésiarchie a tout à gagner à se faire passer pour une congrégation de saints. Pardonnez-moi de ne pas y croire un seul instant. »
languages.original_text: "I imagine it is very advantageous for the Ecclesiarchy to pose as a congregation of saints. Forgive me for not buying any of it."

traits.locale_text: « J'imagine que l'Ecclésiarchie a tout à gagner à se faire passer pour une congrégation de saints. Pardonnez-moi de ne pas y croire un seul instant. »

languages.text: "Eminim ki Ekleşiarşi, sütten çıkma ak kaşık ayağına yatarak iyi ekmek yiyordur. Affedersin ama bana sökmüyor bunlar."
languages.original_text: "I imagine it is very advantageous for the Ecclesiarchy to pose as a congregation of saints. Forgive me for not buying any of it."

traits.locale_text: "Ekleşiarşi'nin azizlerle dolu bir topluluk ayağı yapması çok işine geliyordur eminim. Affedersin ama ben bunların hiçbirini yemiyorum."
